meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Schmidt Linda Mossman Steve Herron Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #892.

td.p: Tom Schmidt, a computer salesman originally from Wood Haven, New York
Linda Mossman, a substitute teacher from Elizaville, New York
Steve Herron, a letter carrier from Shawnee, Oklahoma (whose 3-day cash winnings total $18,200)

tr.td: NEW YORKERS
(Alex: This applies to people from the state, not the city.)
NURSERY RHYMES
WORLD WAR II
ACTORS & ACTRESSES
INVENTORS
STARTS WITH "VI"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Arthur Miller

Tom
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Gimbel\'s made it policy not to fire anyone because of old age after his "Death of a Salesman" opened')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Gimbel's made it policy not to fire anyone because of old age after his "Death of a Salesman" opened

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Linda: Who are the Three Little Pigs?)

little pigs

Linda
')

tr.td: One went to market, one stayed home, one had roast beef, one had none & one cried "Wee, wee, wee"

Hong Kong

Steve
')

toggle('clue_J_1_4', 'clue_J_1_4_stuck', '(Steve: Who is Nelson Rockefeller?)
(Tom: Who is Miller?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
[Laughter]
(Tom: Who is um, James Miller?)
(Alex: See, I might have let you get away with it, Tom, if you had not said that you detected the pattern.)

William E. Miller

SteveTom
Triple Stumper
')

tr.td: Steve
Linda
Tom

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Steve
Linda
Tom
THE SOLAR SYSTEM
PLACE NAMES
SHAKESPEAREAN OPERAS
THE ROMAN EMPIRE
FLAGS
HETERONYMS
(Alex: Words which are spelled the same, but pronounced differently & they have different meanings. We want you to give us both pronunciations.)

tr.td: Steve
Linda
Tom

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Alex had to confer with the judges whether to accept Linda\'s response, as [*] was currently in the House. He was formerly a Senator, so the response was fine.]
TomWho is [something illegible crossed out] Pepper?
$5,200
SteveWho is Sen. Strom Thurmond
$6,300
LindaWho is Senator Claude Pepper?
$4,601
Claude Pepper')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'He is the oldest member of Congress')

tr.td: THE U.S. CONGRESS
He is the oldest member of Congress
Steve
Linda
Tom
3rd place: Maytag dishwasher + Jeopardy! box game
New champion: $12,601
2nd place: La-Z-Boy reliner & al/sy lamps + Jeopardy! box game
Steve
Linda
Tom

12 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

14 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
